name: The Barrow of Jarl Hákon góði
name_original: The Barrow of Jarl Hákon góði
description:
"Long ago an ancient jarl ruled and protected this land. His bravery and exceptional combat skills won him many battles but he tragically had no heir to his name. With his dying breath, he told his fellow warriors to craft his burial chamber into a long hall filled with challenges testing those who may be worthy to inherit his hordes of hidden treasure and earn the honor of continuing his legacy."

"The Barrow of Jarl Hákon góði " is a short viking inspired dungeon for any tabletop roleplaying  system. It was created for the Pamphlet Dungeon Jam.

Writing and design by Masha Lepire. Layout by Eugene Fasano.
